channel.title: smsplus on Gameblabla's blog
channel.description: Recent content in smsplus on Gameblabla's blog

item.title: More work on SMS Plus GX
item.description: Hello guys, Another quick update on SMS Plus GX ! Unfortunately, i realised that i broke save states along the way some time ago, and it took me some time to fix it.

item.title: My fork of SMS Plus GX (itself based on SMS Plus)
item.description: Hello guys, i thought i would write this post to reflect me working my fork of SMS Plus and the progress and stuff i made on it.
